A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The film misses a great opportunity to drive the Story forward in a meaningful direction. Instead it relies on unnecessarily subverting expectations as a gimmick. The emotional moments don't land because they are immediately nullified by cheap jokes and the jokes themselves aren't funny because they throw you out of the movie\, not fitting at all into the context.\n\nBesides\, the film also changes character motivation just for the sake of plot\, betraying what could have been interesting character arcs. The different plot meanwhile seem like quests out of a video game\, making the star wars universe feel generic and for the first time actually really small and boring.
